channel.title: personal on the bluethroat
channel.description: Recent content in personal on the bluethroat

item.title: the bluethroat
item.description: The bluethroat is a tiny, beautiful bird. I'm not sure how and when I came across it but when I did, I couldn't stop thinking about it. I read everything I could about it, I looked at a million pictures online and even got a t-shirt painted with it. I was overjoyed to find that it winters in India and spent a considerable amount of time trying to track it down.
